price: តាមពិត អំណាចរបស់វាគឺមានតែនៅលើពួកដែល គោរពតាមវា និងពួកដែលធ្វើស្ហ៊ីរិកនឹងទ្រង់ប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
arabic: إِنَّمَا سُلۡطَٰنُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِهِۦ مُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innamā sul'ṭānuhu ʿalā alladhīna yatawallawnahu wa-alladhīna hum bihi mush'rikūna
